cyclone.name: MATTHEW
cyclone.current_location: about 35 miles ENE of Daytona Beach Florida
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking north-northwest just offshore the northeast Florida coast, then forecast to skirt the Georgia and South Carolina coasts before turning northeast and moving away from the U.S. by late Sunday.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the South Carolina coast (around Edisto Beach area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from north of Surf City to Cape Lookout, NC
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from Cocoa Beach, FL to Surf City, NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida east coast, Georgia coast and South Carolina coast
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤10%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; brief gusts to 35–40 mph possible.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge in Tampa Bay possible, generally <2 ft above normal tides.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain bands could produce 1–3 inches of rain, isolated 4 inches.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated rip-current risk along nearby Gulf beaches.
